definition[0]: a sheer drop, cliff, slope etc is very steep and almost vertical
definition[1]: sheer nylon, silk etc is very thin and fine, so that it is almost transparent
definition[2]: straight up or down in an almost vertical line
example[1]: cliffs which rose sheer from the sea
definition[3]: to change direction suddenly, especially in order to avoid something
example[2]: The boat sheered away and headed out to sea.
